env.info: (plate 0) (at 0 1) (sort 1 teapoy) (size 1 big) (at 1 1) (sort 2 closet) (size 2 big) (at 2 2) (type 2 container) (opened 2) (sort 3 refrigerator) (size 3 big) (at 3 3) (type 3 container) (closed 3) (sort 4 table) (size 4 big) (at 4 4) (sort 5 airconditioner) (size 5 big) (at 5 5) (sort 6 chair) (size 6 big) (at 6 6) (sort 7 workspace) (size 7 big) (at 7 7) (sort 8 microwave) (size 8 big) (at 8 8) (type 8 container) (sort 9 cupboard) (size 9 big) (at 9 9) (type 9 container) (sort 10 sofa) (size 10 big) (at 10 10) (sort 11 book) (size 11 small) (color 11 blue) (sort 12 remotecontrol) (size 12 small) (color 12 green) (hold 12) (sort 13 remotecontrol) (size 13 small) (color 13 yellow) (sort 14 can) (size 14 small) (color 14 green) (at 14 4) (sort 15 can) (size 15 small) (color 15 yellow) (inside 15 3) (sort 16 book) (size 16 small) (color 16 white) (sort 17 remotecontrol) (size 17 small) (color 17 blue) (inside 17 8)

test.instr: (:ins (:task (putdown X) (:cond (color X green) (sort X remotecontrol))) (:task (pickup X) (:cond (sort X book) (color X blue))) (:task (takeout X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X yellow) (sort Y refrigerator))) (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:task (puton X Y) (:cond (color X yellow) (sort X remotecontrol) (sort Y teapoy))) (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X cupboard))) (:info (closed X) (:cond (sort X microwave))) (:cons_notnot (:info (opened X) (:cond (sort X closet)))) )
test.nl: Put down the green remotecontrol. Pick up the blue book. Take out the can which is yellow from the refrigerator. Open the door of the microwave. Put the yellow remotecontrol on the teapoy. The door of the cupboard is opened. The door of microwave is closed. There must be closet is opened.
